org.waarp.openr66.protocol.networkhandler

Class NetworkChannelReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.networkhandler.NetworkChannelReference

  • public class NetworkChannelReference
extends Object
    NetworkChannelReference object to keep Network channel open while some local channels are attached to it.

      • checkLastTime

        public long checkLastTime(long delay)
        Check if the last time used is ok with a delay applied to the current time (timeout)
        Parameters:
        delay -
        Returns:
        <= 0 if OK, else > 0 (should send a KeepAlive or wait that time in ms)
